tilesmallfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	spacewidth 4

	! #04097
	"\"" #04098
	# #04099
	$ #04100
	% #04101
	& #04102
	' #04103
	( #04104
	) #04105
	* #04106
	+ #04107
	, #04108
	- #04109
	. #04110
	/ #04111
	0 #04112
	1 #04113
	2 #04114
	3 #04115
	4 #04116
	5 #04117
	6 #04118
	7 #04119
	8 #04120
	9 #04121
	: #04122
	; #04123
	< #04124
	= #04125
	> #04126
	? #04127
	@ #04128
	A #04129
	B #04130
	C #04131
	D #04132
	E #04133
	F #04134
	G #04135
	H #04136
	I #04137
	J #04138
	K #04139
	L #04140
	M #04141
	N #04142
	O #04143
	P #04144
	Q #04145
	R #04146
	S #04147
	T #04148
	U #04149
	V #04150
	W #04151
	X #04152
	Y #04153
	Z #04154
	[ #04155
	\\ #04156
	] #04157
	^ #04158
	_ #04159
	a #04161
	b #04162
	c #04163
	d #04164
	e #04165
	f #04166
	g #04167
	h #04168
	i #04169
	j #04170
	k #04171
	l #04172
	m #04173
	n #04174
	o #04175
	p #04176
	q #04177
	r #04178
	s #04179
	t #04180
	u #04181
	v #04182
	w #04183
	x #04184
	y #04185
	z #04186
	"-{" #04187
	| #04188
	"-}" #04189
	~ #04190
}

tilebigfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 1
	spacewidth 5

	! #04193
	"\"" #04194
	# #04195
	$ #04196
	% #04197
	& #04198
	' #04199
	( #04200
	) #04201
	* #04202
	+ #04203
	, #04204
	- #04205
	. #04206
	/ #04207
	0 #04208
	1 #04209
	2 #04210
	3 #04211
	4 #04212
	5 #04213
	6 #04214
	7 #04215
	8 #04216
	9 #04217
	: #04218
	; #04219
	< #04220
	= #04221
	> #04222
	? #04223
	A #04225
	B #04226
	C #04227
	D #04228
	E #04229
	F #04230
	G #04231
	H #04232
	I #04233
	J #04234
	K #04235
	L #04236
	M #04237
	N #04238
	O #04239
	P #04240
	Q #04241
	R #04242
	S #04243
	T #04244
	U #04245
	V #04246
	W #04247
	X #04248
	Y #04249
	Z #04250
	[ #04251
	\\ #04252
	] #04253
	^ #04254
	_ #04255
	a #04257
	b #04258
	c #04259
	d #04260
	e #04261
	f #04262
	g #04263
	h #04264
	i #04265
	j #04266
	k #04267
	l #04268
	m #04269
	n #04270
	o #04271
	p #04272
	q #04273
	r #04274
	s #04275
	t #04276
	u #04277
	v #04278
	w #04279
	x #04280
	y #04281
	z #04282
}

smallfont2
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 1
	minluminosity 0 
	spacewidth 4

	! #04385
	"\"" #04386
	# #04387
	$ #04388
	% #04389
	& #04390
	' #04391
	( #04392
	) #04393
	* #04394
	+ #04395
	, #04396
	- #04397
	. #04398
	/ #04399
	0 #04400
	1 #04401
	2 #04402
	3 #04403
	4 #04404
	5 #04405
	6 #04406
	7 #04407
	8 #04408
	9 #04409
	: #04410
	; #04411
	< #04412
	= #04413
	> #04414
	? #04415
	A #04417
	B #04418
	C #04419
	D #04420
	E #04421
	F #04422
	G #04423
	H #04424
	I #04425
	J #04426
	K #04427
	L #04428
	M #04429
	N #04430
	O #04431
	P #04432
	Q #04433
	R #04434
	S #04435
	T #04436
	U #04437
	V #04438
	W #04439
	X #04440
	Y #04441
	Z #04442
	[ #04443
	\\ #04444
	] #04445
	_ #04447
	a #04449
	b #04450
	c #04451
	d #04452
	e #04453
	f #04454
	g #04455
	h #04456
	i #04457
	j #04458
	k #04459
	l #04460
	m #04461
	n #04462
	o #04463
	p #04464
	q #04465
	r #04466
	s #04467
	t #04468
	u #04469
	v #04470
	w #04471
	x #04472
	y #04473
	z #04474
}

digifont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	spacewidth 4

	! #04481
	"\"" #04482
	$ #04484
	% #04485
	' #04487
	( #04488
	) #04489
	+ #04491
	, #04492
	- #04493
	. #04494
	/ #04495
	0 #04496
	1 #04497
	2 #04498
	3 #04499
	4 #04500
	5 #04501
	6 #04502
	7 #04503
	8 #04504
	9 #04505
	: #04506
	; #04507
	< #04508
	= #04509
	> #04510
	A #04513
	B #04514
	C #04515
	D #04516
	E #04517
	F #04518
	G #04519
	H #04520
	I #04521
	J #04522
	K #04523
	L #04524
	M #04525
	N #04526
	O #04527
	P #04528
	Q #04529
	R #04530
	S #04531
	T #04532
	U #04533
	V #04534
	W #04535
	X #04536
	Y #04537
	Z #04538
	[ #04539
	\\ #04540
	] #04541
	a #04545
	b #04546
	c #04547
	d #04548
	e #04549
	f #04550
	g #04551
	h #04552
	i #04553
	j #04554
	k #04555
	l #04556
	m #04557
	n #04558
	o #04559
	p #04560
	q #04561
	r #04562
	s #04563
	t #04564
	u #04565
	v #04566
	w #04567
	x #04568
	y #04569
	z #04570
	"-{" #04571
	| #04572
	"-}" #04573
}
